DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine if topically applied nitric oxide gas is effective in reducing the quantity of bacteria (including MRSA)in a wound.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial on the Reduction of Methicillin Resistant Staphylococcus Aureus (MRSA)
